body_html: Apparently there is no entry for MSELoss in torch/nn/_functions/thnn/auto_double_backwards.py. In theory this wouldn't be necessary if autograd were keeping track of the graph, though. Should be as simple as returning -2 if I am doing my calculus in my head correctly.
body_text: Apparently there is no entry for MSELoss in torch/nn/_functions/thnn/auto_double_backwards.py. In theory this wouldn't be necessary if autograd were keeping track of the graph, though. Should be as simple as returning -2 if I am doing my calculus in my head correctly.
body: Apparently there is no entry for MSELoss in `torch/nn/_functions/thnn/auto_double_backwards.py`. In theory this wouldn't be necessary if autograd were keeping track of the graph, though. Should be as simple as returning `-2` if I am doing my calculus in my head correctly.
